trans-unit.source: Represents a collection of <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: Representa una colección de objetos <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2" />.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Esta clase no puede heredarse.

trans-unit.source: When an <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2> store is opened, the result is represented by an <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection> object.
trans-unit.target: Cuando un <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2> almacén se abre, el resultado se representa mediante un <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection> objeto.

trans-unit.source: If you are familiar with the unmanaged Cryptographic API constructs, you can think of an <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection> as a memory store of <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2> objects.
trans-unit.target: Si está familiarizado con las construcciones de API de cifrado no administradas, se puede considerar un <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection> como un almacén de memoria de <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2> objetos.

trans-unit.source: The following code example opens the current user's personal certificate store, selects only valid certificates, allows the user to select a certificate, and then writes certificate and certificate chain information to the console.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo de código siguiente se abre el almacén de certificados personales del usuario actual, selecciona sólo los certificados válidos, permite al usuario seleccionar un certificado y, a continuación, escribe certificado y la información de la cadena de certificados en la consola.

trans-unit.source: The output depends on the certificate the user selects.
trans-unit.target: El resultado depende del certificado que el usuario selecciona.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa una nueva instancia de la clase <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection" /> class without any <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2" /> information.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa una nueva instancia de la clase <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection" /> sin ninguna información sobre <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2" />.

trans-unit.source: This constructor creates an empty <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection> object, which is unlike the other constructors that use certificate or collection information to create the object.
trans-unit.target: Este constructor crea vacío <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection> objeto, que es diferente a los otros constructores que usan la información de certificado o la colección para crear el objeto.

trans-unit.source: The following code example opens the current user's personal certificate store, selects only valid certificates, allows the user to select a certificate, and then writes certificate and certificate chain information to the console.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo de código siguiente se abre el almacén de certificados personales del usuario actual, selecciona sólo los certificados válidos, permite al usuario seleccionar un certificado y, a continuación, escribe certificado y la información de la cadena de certificados en la consola.

trans-unit.source: The output depends on the certificate the user selects.
trans-unit.target: El resultado depende del certificado que el usuario selecciona.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2" /> object to start the collection from.
trans-unit.target: Objeto <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2" /> a partir del cual se iniciará la colección.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection" /> class using an <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa una nueva instancia de la clase <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection" /> mediante un objeto <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2" />.

trans-unit.source: An array of <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: Matriz de objetos <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection" /> class using an array of <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa una nueva instancia de la clase <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection" /> mediante una matriz de objetos <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2" />.

trans-unit.source: The following code example opens the current user's personal certificate store, selects only valid certificates, allows the user to select a certificate, and then writes certificate and certificate chain information to the console.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo de código siguiente se abre el almacén de certificados personales del usuario actual, selecciona sólo los certificados válidos, permite al usuario seleccionar un certificado y, a continuación, escribe certificado y la información de la cadena de certificados en la consola.

trans-unit.source: The output depends on the certificate you select.
trans-unit.target: El resultado depende del certificado que seleccione.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Un objeto <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection" /> class using the specified certificate collection.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa una nueva instancia de la clase <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection" /> utilizando la colección de certificados especificada.

trans-unit.source: The following code example opens the current user's personal certificate store, selects only valid certificates, allows the user to select a certificate, and then writes certificate and certificate chain information to the console.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo de código siguiente se abre el almacén de certificados personales del usuario actual, selecciona sólo los certificados válidos, permite al usuario seleccionar un certificado y, a continuación, escribe certificado y la información de la cadena de certificados en la consola.

trans-unit.source: The output depends on the certificate the user selects.
trans-unit.target: El resultado depende del certificado que el usuario selecciona.

trans-unit.source: An X.509 certificate represented as an <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Certificado X.509 representado como objeto <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2" />.

trans-unit.source: Adds an object to the end of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection" />.
trans-unit.target: Agrega un objeto al final de <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection" /> index at which the <paramref name="certificate" /> has been added.
trans-unit.target: Índice de <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection" /> en el que se ha agregado <paramref name="certificate" />.

trans-unit.source: This method adds an <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2> object to a collection and returns the index location of the certificate.
trans-unit.target: Este método agrega un <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2> objeto a una colección y devuelve la ubicación de índice del certificado.

trans-unit.source: The following code example opens an X.509 certificate store, adds and deletes certificates, and then closes the store.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo de código siguiente se abre un almacén de certificados X.509, agrega y elimina los certificados y, a continuación, cierra el almacén.

trans-unit.source: It assumes that you have three certificates to add to and remove from a local store.
trans-unit.target: Se supone que tiene tres certificados para agregar y quitar de un almacén local.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="certificate" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="certificate" /> es <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: Adds multiple <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2" /> objects to an <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Agrega varios objetos <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2" /> a un objeto <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection" />.

trans-unit.source: An array of <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: Matriz de objetos <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2" />.

trans-unit.source: Adds multiple <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2" /> objects in an array to the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Agrega varios objetos <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2" /> de una matriz al objeto <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection" />.

trans-unit.source: Use this method if you have an array of <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2> objects to add to an <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection> object.
trans-unit.target: Utilice este método si tiene una matriz de <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2> objetos que se va a agregar a un <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection> objeto.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection.AddRange%2A> and <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection.RemoveRange%2A> methods process requests transactionally, so that if a single add or remove fails, the entire operation is aborted.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection.AddRange%2A> y <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection.RemoveRange%2A> métodos procesan solicitudes transaccionalmente, por lo que si una sola agregar o quitar falla, se anula la operación completa.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="certificates" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="certificates" /> es <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Un objeto <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection" />.

trans-unit.source: Adds multiple <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2" /> objects in an <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection" /> object to another <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Agrega varios objetos <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2" /> de un objeto <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection" /> a otro objeto <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection" />.

trans-unit.source: Use this method if you have certificates in an <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection> object that you want to add to another <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection> object.
trans-unit.target: Utilice este método si tiene certificados en un <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection> objeto que se va a agregar a otro <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection> objeto.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection.AddRange%2A> and <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection.RemoveRange%2A> methods process requests transactionally, so that if a single add or remove fails, the entire operation is aborted.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection.AddRange%2A> y <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection.RemoveRange%2A> métodos procesan solicitudes transaccionalmente, por lo que si una sola agregar o quitar falla, se anula la operación completa.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="certificates" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="certificates" /> es <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2" /> object to locate in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Objeto <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2" /> que se va a buscar en la colección.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection" /> object contains a specific certificate.
trans-unit.target: Determina si el objeto <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection" /> contiene un certificado específico.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection" /> contains the specified <paramref name="certificate" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> si <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection" /> contiene el objeto <paramref name="certificate" /> especificado; de lo contrario, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: This method performs a linear search; therefore, the average execution time is proportional to the <xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase.Count%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Este método realiza una búsqueda lineal; por lo tanto, el tiempo medio de ejecución es proporcional a la <xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase.Count%2A> propiedad.

trans-unit.source: That is, this method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is <xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase.Count%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Es decir, este método es una O (`n`) operación, donde `n` es <xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase.Count%2A>.

trans-unit.source: This method determines equality by calling the <xref:System.Object.Equals%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: Este método determina la igualdad llamando a la <xref:System.Object.Equals%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> método.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="certificate" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="certificate" /> es <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: Exports X.509 certificate information based on content type into a byte array.
trans-unit.target: Exporta a una matriz de bytes información del certificado X.509 basada en el tipo de contenido.

trans-unit.source: A supported <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Objeto <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType" /> compatible.

trans-unit.source: Exports X.509 certificate information into a byte array.
trans-unit.target: Exporta información del certificado X.509 a una matriz de bytes.

trans-unit.source: X.509 certificate information in a byte array.
trans-unit.target: Información del certificado X.509 en una matriz de bytes.

trans-unit.source: This method supports content types that do not require a password.
trans-unit.target: Este método es compatible con tipos de contenido que no requieren una contraseña.

trans-unit.source: A supported <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Objeto <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType" /> compatible.

trans-unit.source: A string used to protect the byte array.
trans-unit.target: Cadena utilizada para proteger la matriz de bytes.

trans-unit.source: Exports X.509 certificate information into a byte array using a password.
trans-unit.target: Exporta a una matriz de bytes información del certificado X.509 utilizando una contraseña.

trans-unit.source: X.509 certificate information in a byte array.
trans-unit.target: Información del certificado X.509 en una matriz de bytes.

trans-unit.source: This method supports the following <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType> types:
trans-unit.target: Este método admite los siguientes <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType> tipos:

trans-unit.source: The certificate is unreadable, the content is invalid or, in the case of a certificate requiring a password, the private key could not be exported because the password provided was incorrect.
trans-unit.target: El certificado es ilegible, el contenido no es válido o, si se trata de un certificado que requiere contraseña, no se ha podido exportar la clave privada porque la contraseña proporcionada era incorrecta.

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509FindType" /> values.
trans-unit.target: Uno de los valores de <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509FindType" />.

trans-unit.source: The search criteria as an object.
trans-unit.target: El criterio de búsqueda como objeto.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to allow only valid certificates to be returned from the search; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> para que la búsqueda sólo pueda devolver certificados válidos; de lo contrario, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Searches an <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection" /> object using the search criteria specified by the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509FindType" /> enumeration and the <paramref name="findValue" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Busca un objeto <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection" /> utilizando los criterios de búsqueda especificados por la enumeración <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509FindType" /> y el objeto <paramref name="findValue" />.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Un objeto <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection" />.

trans-unit.source: Use this method to find <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2> objects if no user interaction is needed.
trans-unit.target: Utilice este método para buscar <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2> objetos si se necesita ninguna interacción del usuario.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection.Find%2A> method to allow the user to select <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2> objects.
trans-unit.target: Use la <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection.Find%2A> método para permitir al usuario seleccionar <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2> objetos.

trans-unit.source: Note that this method can be used in a cascading or nested style, narrowing the search criteria with each call to the method.
trans-unit.target: Tenga en cuenta que este método puede utilizarse en un estilo en cascada o anidado, los criterios de búsqueda con cada llamada al método de restricción.

trans-unit.source: The following code example opens the current user's personal certificate store, finds only valid certificates, allows the user to select a certificate, and then writes certificate and certificate chain information to the console.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo de código siguiente se abre el almacén de certificados personales del usuario actual, busca sólo los certificados válidos, permite al usuario seleccionar un certificado y, a continuación, escribe certificado y la información de la cadena de certificados en la consola.

trans-unit.source: The output depends on the certificate the user selects.
trans-unit.target: El resultado depende del certificado que el usuario selecciona.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="findType" /> is invalid.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="findType" /> no es válido.

trans-unit.source: Returns an enumerator that can iterate through a <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Devuelve un enumerador capaz de recorrer en iteración un objeto <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection" />.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Enumerator" /> object that can iterate through the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Objeto <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Enumerator" /> que puede recorrer en iteración el objeto <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection" />.

trans-unit.source: Enumerators allow read-only access to data in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Los enumeradores permiten el acceso de solo lectura a los datos de la colección.

trans-unit.source: Enumerators cannot be used to modify the underlying collection.
trans-unit.target: Los enumeradores no pueden usarse para modificar la colección subyacente.

trans-unit.source: Imports a certificate into a <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Importa un certificado a un objeto <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection" />.

trans-unit.source: A byte array containing data from an X.509 certificate.
trans-unit.target: Matriz de bytes que contiene los datos de un certificado X.509.

trans-unit.source: Imports a certificate in the form of a byte array into a <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Importa un certificado en forma de matriz de bytes a un objeto <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection" />.

trans-unit.source: This method imports a certificate in the form of a byte array into a <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection> object.
trans-unit.target: Este método importa un certificado en forma de una matriz de bytes en un <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection> objeto.

trans-unit.source: This method supports the following <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType> types:
trans-unit.target: Este método admite los siguientes <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType> tipos:

trans-unit.source: The name of the file containing the certificate information.
trans-unit.target: Nombre del archivo que contiene la información del certificado.

trans-unit.source: Imports a certificate file into a <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Importa un archivo de certificado a un objeto <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection" />.

trans-unit.source: This method supports the following <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType> types:
trans-unit.target: Este método admite los siguientes <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType> tipos:

trans-unit.source: A byte array containing data from an <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Matriz de bytes que contiene datos de un objeto <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2" />.

trans-unit.source: The password required to access the certificate information.
trans-unit.target: Contraseña requerida para obtener acceso a la información del certificado.

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of the enumeration values that control how and where the certificate is imported.
trans-unit.target: Una combinación bit a bit de los valores de enumeración que controlan cómo y dónde se importó el certificado.

trans-unit.source: Imports a certificate, in the form of a byte array that requires a password to access the certificate, into a <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Importa a un objeto <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection" /> un certificado en forma de matriz de bytes para cuyo acceso se requiere contraseña.

trans-unit.source: This method can be used with a PFX/PKCS12 binary large object (BLOB) protected by a password.
trans-unit.target: Este método puede utilizarse con un PFX/PKCS12 objeto binario grande (BLOB) protegido mediante contraseña.

trans-unit.source: Key containers associated with certificates in the PFX/PKCS12 BLOB can be created and the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509KeyStorageFlags> value can be used to control this process.
trans-unit.target: Se pueden crear contenedores de claves asociados a certificados en el BLOB PFX/PKCS12 y <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509KeyStorageFlags> valor puede usarse para controlar este proceso.

trans-unit.source: Note that if you do not create a key container, the private key is not persisted.
trans-unit.target: Tenga en cuenta que si no se crea un contenedor de claves, no se conserva la clave privada.

trans-unit.source: This method imports a certificate byte array into a collection of certificates.
trans-unit.target: Este método importa una matriz de bytes de certificado a una colección de certificados.

trans-unit.source: This method supports the following <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType> types:
trans-unit.target: Este método admite los siguientes <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType> tipos:

trans-unit.source: The name of the file containing the certificate information.
trans-unit.target: Nombre del archivo que contiene la información del certificado.

trans-unit.source: The password required to access the certificate information.
trans-unit.target: Contraseña requerida para obtener acceso a la información del certificado.

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of the enumeration values that control how and where the certificate is imported.
trans-unit.target: Una combinación bit a bit de los valores de enumeración que controlan cómo y dónde se importó el certificado.

trans-unit.source: Imports a certificate file that requires a password into a <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Importa a un objeto <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection" /> un archivo de certificado que requiere contraseña.

trans-unit.source: This method can be used with a PFX/PKCS12 file or other certificate files that require a password.
trans-unit.target: Este método puede utilizarse con un archivo PFX/PKCS12 u otros archivos de certificado que requieren una contraseña.

trans-unit.source: Key containers associated with certificates in the PFX/PKCS12 file can be created and <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509KeyStorageFlags> value can be used to control this process.
trans-unit.target: Se pueden crear contenedores de claves asociados a certificados en el archivo PFX/PKCS12 y <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509KeyStorageFlags> valor puede usarse para controlar este proceso.

trans-unit.source: Note that if you do not create a key container, the private key is not persisted.
trans-unit.target: Tenga en cuenta que si no se crea un contenedor de claves, no se conserva la clave privada.

trans-unit.source: Note that a PFX/PKCS12 file can contain more than one certificate.
trans-unit.target: Tenga en cuenta que un archivo PFX/PKCS12 puede contener más de un certificado.

trans-unit.source: This method imports the first certificate associated with the private key or, if no private key is found, the first certificate found.
trans-unit.target: Este método importa el primer certificado asociado a la clave privada o, si no se encuentra ninguna clave privada, el primer certificado que se encuentra.

trans-unit.source: This method supports the following <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType> types:
trans-unit.target: Este método admite los siguientes <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType> tipos:

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index at which to insert <c>certificate</c>.
trans-unit.target: Índice de base cero donde se inserta <c>certificate</c>.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2" /> object to insert.
trans-unit.target: Objeto <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2" /> que se va a insertar.

trans-unit.source: Inserts an object into the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection" /> object at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: Inserta un objeto en el objeto <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection" /> en el índice especificado.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase.Count%2A> property already equals the capacity of the list, the capacity is doubled by automatically reallocating the internal array before the new element is inserted.
trans-unit.target: Si el <xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase.Count%2A> propiedad ya es igual a la capacidad de la lista, se duplica la capacidad reasignando automáticamente la matriz interna antes de que se insertó el nuevo elemento.

trans-unit.source: If `index` is equal to <xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase.Count%2A>, `certificate` is added to the end of the collection.
trans-unit.target: Si `index` es igual a <xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase.Count%2A>, `certificate` se agrega al final de la colección.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="index" /> is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="index" /> es menor que cero.

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: O bien

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="index" /> is greater than the <see cref="P:System.Collections.CollectionBase.Count" /> property.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="index" /> es mayor que la propiedad <see cref="P:System.Collections.CollectionBase.Count" />.

trans-unit.source: The collection is read-only.
trans-unit.target: La colección es de solo lectura.

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: O bien

trans-unit.source: The collection has a fixed size.
trans-unit.target: La colección tiene un tamaño fijo.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="certificate" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="certificate" /> es <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the element to get or set.
trans-unit.target: Índice de base cero del elemento que se va a obtener o establecer.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the element at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene o establece el elemento en el índice especificado.

trans-unit.source: The element at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: Elemento en el índice especificado.

trans-unit.source: This property provides the ability to access a specific element in the collection by using the following syntax: `myCollection[index]`.
trans-unit.target: Esta propiedad permite obtener acceso a un elemento específico de la colección utilizando la sintaxis siguiente: `myCollection[index]`.

trans-unit.source: The following code example opens the current user's personal certificate store, selects only valid certificates, allows the user to select a certificate, and then writes certificate and certificate chain information to the console.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo de código siguiente se abre el almacén de certificados personales del usuario actual, selecciona sólo los certificados válidos, permite al usuario seleccionar un certificado y, a continuación, escribe certificado y la información de la cadena de certificados en la consola.

trans-unit.source: The output depends on the certificate the user selects.
trans-unit.target: El resultado depende del certificado que el usuario selecciona.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="index" /> is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="index" /> es menor que cero.

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: O bien

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="index" /> is equal to or greater than the <see cref="P:System.Collections.CollectionBase.Count" /> property.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="index" /> es mayor o igual que la propiedad <see cref="P:System.Collections.CollectionBase.Count" />.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="index" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="index" /> es <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2" /> object to be removed from the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Objeto <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2" /> que se ha de quitar de <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection" />.

trans-unit.source: Removes the first occurrence of a certificate from the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Quita del objeto <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection" /> la primera aparición de un certificado.

trans-unit.source: This method removes the first occurrence of a certificate.
trans-unit.target: Este método quita la primera aparición de un certificado.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="certificate" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="certificate" /> es <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: Removes multiple <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2" /> objects from an <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Quita varios objetos <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2" /> de un objeto <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection" />.

trans-unit.source: An array of <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: Matriz de objetos <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2" />.

trans-unit.source: Removes multiple <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2" /> objects in an array from an <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Quita de un objeto <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2" /> varios objetos <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection" /> contenidos en una matriz.

trans-unit.source: Use this method if you have an array of <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2> objects to remove from an <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection> object.
trans-unit.target: Utilice este método si tiene una matriz de <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2> objetos que se va a quitar de un <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection> objeto.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection.AddRange%2A> and <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection.RemoveRange%2A> methods process requests transactionally, so that if a single add or remove fails, the entire operation is aborted.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection.AddRange%2A> y <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection.RemoveRange%2A> métodos procesan solicitudes transaccionalmente, por lo que si una sola agregar o quitar falla, se anula la operación completa.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="certificates" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="certificates" /> es <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Un objeto <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection" />.

trans-unit.source: Removes multiple <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2" /> objects in an <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection" /> object from another <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Quita varios objetos <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2" /> contenidos en un objeto <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection" /> de otro objeto <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection" />.

trans-unit.source: Use this method if you have certificates in an <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection> object that you want to remove from another <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection> object.
trans-unit.target: Utilice este método si tiene certificados en un <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection> objeto que se va a quitar de la otra <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection> objeto.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection.AddRange%2A> and <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection.RemoveRange%2A> methods process requests transactionally, so that if a single add or remove fails, the entire operation is aborted.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection.AddRange%2A> y <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection.RemoveRange%2A> métodos procesan solicitudes transaccionalmente, por lo que si una sola agregar o quitar falla, se anula la operación completa.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="certificates" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="certificates" /> es <see langword="null" />.
